title: Salesloft

title: iTexico

User of AWS and Google Cloud as cloud service, using Google Vision API, EC2, IAM roles, Cognito, ELB, Kubernetes, Rabbit MQ, Docker, S3, Cloudstack, Mongo Atlas, Google Storage, Google Pub/Sub.

title: Futurecommerce

title: Armonniza
description: Lead Developer on a GERP for Mexican Government, based on PHP, MariaDB, Javascript and Angular JS. Usage of SQL and NoSQL databases. Lead Developer for a software for pharmacies based on PHP, MariaDB, Javascript and Angular JS. Developer on mobile apps based on Xamarin Framework.

title: Bhacking
